pr_title: Fix broken token creation in sandbox

timeline.message: Fix root URL of sandbox API

timeline.bodyText:
In the website for token creation, we use this endpoint: ENV["API_METADATA_URL_SANDBOX"] + '/Token'.
So, we'll just want to make sure the API_METADATA_URL_SANDBOX is set correctly. I believe it should be set to https://sandbox.dpc.cms.gov/api/v1, correct? Which has v1 whereas the publicURL here does not.
timeline.author: switzersc-usds
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 dpc.api {
 
-    publicURL = "https://dpc.cms.gov/api" # The root URL at which the application is accessible, if necssary, include the port, do not include the application version
+    publicURL = "https://sandbox.dpc.cms.gov/api" # The root URL at which the application is accessible, if necssary, include the port, do not include the application version

replies.bodyText: v1 is added elsewhere in the code, and ENV["API_METADATA_URL_SANDBOX"] was set incorrect initially (it's why users couldn't upload public keys after rolling out Akamai), but it's now using the correct URL in sandbox (and was verified yesterday).
replies.author: ronaldheft-usds

replies.bodyText: Great, then this should be good to go from the website side of things.
replies.author: switzersc-usds
